TopicTitle: What if Jeb got promoted!? What would his name be?

Articles.Content: ie: Kaptain Jeb; Komander Jeb; Kolonel Jeb? I was thinking with the advent of .24 and the reputation thing, wouldn't it be cool if the Kerbals got promoted ?
My Jeb got promoted to Head of Snack Relations aboard the space station, however I now need to get working on science to make it again and put him back up there again.
I think the highest order of merit is "mechanical"

Commander Jebediah of the Kerbin International Space Fleet; receiver of three ODE's; Knight of the crown; receiver of the Nobel Explosion Prize; winner of the Krakennistan national hamburger eating competition and all-round piloting competition; competitor and medal-winner of the Kerbal Space Olympics.

Too far? Not far enough.

Commander Jebediah of the Kerbin International Space Fleet; receiver of three ODE's; Knight of the crown; receiver of the Nobel Explosion Prize; winner of the Krakennistan national hamburger eating competition and all-round piloting competition; competitor and medal-winner of the Kerbal Space Olympics.

Too far? Not far enough.

You forgot to replace every "c" with a "k"
Kommander Jebediah, the first Kerbal Spektre
He's been promoted to Supreme Chief Administrative Designer. Ever since, the failure rate of our rockets has been a lot lower
What in the hell is a 'Spektre'?!
You cannot promote Jeb. Jeb promotes you.

What in the hell is a 'Spektre'?!

Spectres. With obligatory 'k' in place of the 'c'.
Kerman is the only rank that allows Kerbals to go to space. Any lower or higher rank excludes you from space adventures. So if Jeb was promoted he'd disappear from the roster.
I think Jebs relaxed attitude to health and safety probably means he's unlikely to get too much power and authority.. just as well for the rest of Kerbal kind..

Jebediah?

When he was transferred to Astronaut training, he was already an Colonel in the Airforce. After making thw third Mun landing and becoming the first Kerbal in space, he was promoted to Brigadier General and promoted to an position that headed the astronaut corps and morale/foods and equipment. But its a desk job.

His title is now "Jebediah, Director of the Astronaut Corps". Unlike the rest of the Directors, he oddly prefers to work alone in an hitchiker module just outside the SPH, just cause. Unlike most other representations of Jeb, I like to think of him ad an serious, hardworking Kerbal who prioritizes safety of the crew than someone who keeps messing up.

Anyways, Jebediah has one of the best safety records of any past Director of the Astronaut Corps.

Edited January 31, 2014 by NASAFanboy

What if Jeb got promoted!? What would his name be?

Jebediah Kerman.

Mechanikus Commander Jebediah Kerman, of the glorious Imperium of Kerbol.

Or more simply, Commander.

Then Director, then President/Prime Minister/King/Bosskerb

I propose the following ranks:

Rocket Fodder

Survivor

Kosmonaut

Spontaneous unplanned disassembly specialist

Space hero

Maybe not in that order
You know you can edit their names in the save files? Give him any title you want. "Jebediah, Khan of Khans, King of Kings," etc.
I think it's been well-established that his official title is Thrillmaster.
This isn't the military, so his name would still just be Jeb.

This isn't the military, so his name would still just be Jeb.

Neither was NASA, but most of the astronauts were (even today) active duty military.
